about.description:
Hi! I'm Sherilyn Koshy. 
Full-stack software developer with an insatiable curiosity for fresh challenges. Eager to create meaningful impact through mission-driven solutions. Adept at writing precise technical documentation, responding swiftly to high-severity incidents, and safely deploying code to production. With over 7 years of experience in FinTech, Iâ€™ve cultivated a versatile skill set spanning risk management, corporate finance, and operations.
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, I enjoy sampling New York City's diverse culinary scene, exploring new neighborhoods, and playing the NYT games.
about.skillsDescription: Here's a snapshot of the technologies I've used:
about.getInTouchDescription: If you are interested in collaborating or just want to chat, feel free to connect through LinkedIn or email!

works.name: Alpha Marketplace
works.description: Mock e-commerce platform for buying and selling cars online. Built using the MERN stack. Users can create accounts, browse cars, add them to their cart, and list items for sale.

works.name: Pet Pals
works.description: Mock social media platform for pet adoption. Built using the ReactJS, Django, PostgreSQL, and Python. Users can create profiles, browse cats & dogs available for adoption, add them to their favorites, and comment on posts.

works.name: Word Scramble
works.description: Simple word scramble game built with vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS.
